name: This Box of Mine (Ludwig Jam)
description:
The game looks and plays much better when downloaded. The web version might lag a bit.

"This Box of Mine" is a game I made for the 2021 Ludwig Gamejam, it features a frog that has to escape but is trapped in a box. This is a Foddian game, meaning very difficult, patience testing, and anger inducing.

I programmed and "designed" the game, made the music, and  I also did some art, although most of it was acquired for free, the sound effects where also acquired for free. Full credits are in-game.
